name: 嚴建隆
objective:
CAD 套裝軟體介紹、CAD 數值技巧、二維畫圖、三維畫圖、曲面模型、實體模型建立、動畫之製作、最佳化設計、整合性之 CAD 系統及專題。
Introduction of CAD software package. Review of Numerical technique for CAD.2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, surface modeling, solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.
